@graph.name: Sheet Pan Tomato Soup - A Cozy Kitchen
@graph.description: Sheet Pan Tomato Soup is an easy solution to a delicious soup. It’s creamy, delicious and super easy to make.

@graph.name: Adrianna Adarme
@graph.description: A Cozy Kitchen is a recipe blog written by Adrianna Adarme. Adrianna likes corgis, pancakes and cute things.

@graph.name: Sheet Pan Tomato Soup
@graph.description: Sheet Pan Tomato Soup is an easy solution to a delicious soup. It’s creamy, delicious and super easy to make. Use up a bunch of summer tomatoes for the best tomato soup. And of course, serve it with a buttery, crispy, cheesy grilled cheese.
recipeIngredient: 2/3 cup  extra virgin olive oil  (plus more for garnish)
1  tablespoon  creme fraiche or sour cream or yogurt  (plus more for garnish)

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F.  Slice the top end off the head of garlic. Place it cut side down on a 1-inch baking sheet. Then add the cherry tomatoes, quartered onion and thyme. Drizzle with olive oil and salt and pepper. Toss it all together and transfer to the oven.
recipeInstructions.name: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F.  Slice the top end off the head of garlic. Place it cut side down on a 1-inch baking sheet. Then add the cherry tomatoes, quartered onion and thyme. Drizzle with olive oil and salt and pepper. Toss it all together and transfer to the oven.

recipeInstructions.text: Bake until the tomatoes are softened and simmering, about 30 to 35 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Bake until the tomatoes are softened and simmering, about 30 to 35 minutes.

recipeInstructions.text: Flip the garlic over and let it cool slightly. Add the tomatoes to a blender, along with the onion and thyme leaves. Squeeze the garlic cloves out of the head of garlic and add them to the blender.
recipeInstructions.name: Flip the garlic over and let it cool slightly. Add the tomatoes to a blender, along with the onion and thyme leaves. Squeeze the garlic cloves out of the head of garlic and add them to the blender.

recipeInstructions.text: Pour in the vegetable broth and creme fraiche or yogurt and blend until smooth. You could also add this to a pot and use an immersion blender.
recipeInstructions.name: Pour in the vegetable broth and creme fraiche or yogurt and blend until smooth. You could also add this to a pot and use an immersion blender.

recipeInstructions.text: Give it a taste and adjust the salt to your liking. Divide amongst bowls and drizzle with creme fraiche or sour cream and garnish with basil.
recipeInstructions.name: Give it a taste and adjust the salt to your liking. Divide amongst bowls and drizzle with creme fraiche or sour cream and garnish with basil.

@graph.keywords: sheet pan soup, tomato soup and grilled cheese
